titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey land to the town of Thompson, Connecticut, for fire fighting and emergency services purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 3/9/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey, without consideration, specified land located in the West Thompson Lake project area to the town of Thompson, Connecticut, for use for fire fighting and related emergency services purposes.
